channel.title: Tetris Game on Python programming

item.title: Set up Tetris UI
item.description: Simply go over the previous class Task Time Quickly go through the Python basics we have already learned 10 mins Step 1: Create a Python file tetris_game.py As we have already learned how to create a Python file, open Sublime text editor -> File -> New File -> press CTRL + S -> name the file as tetris_game.py Step 2: Import required libraries Copy and Paste the code snippet below to import required libraries.
